player_regression_league_mp.description: Midpoint of a QBs regression curve to the league average

player_regression_league_height.description: Maximum amount of regression to the league average

player_regression_career_mp.description: Midpoint of a QBs regression curve to their career average

player_regression_career_height.description: Maximum amount of regression to their career average

player_sf.description: Alpha for the players week over week EWMA

player_career_sf_base.description: Base of the decay curve for a player's alpha

player_career_sf_height.description: Maximum decay of the players career EWMA

player_career_sf_mp.description: Midpoint of decay for a players career EWMA

rookie_draft_intercept.description: Intercept for the rookie draft regression curve

rookie_draft_slope.description: Slope for the rookie draft regression curve

rookie_league_reg.description: Regression of a the team's previous QB Value to the league average

rookie_league_cap.description: Maximum discount to the league average for a rookie QB

rookie_undrafted_draft_number.description: Draft position assigned to an undrafted rookie

team_off_league_reversion.description: Reversion to the league average for a team's starting QB value

team_off_qb_reversion.description: Reversion of the team's starting QB value to their week 1 starter QB value

team_off_sf.description: Alpha for the team's QB value week over week EWMA

team_def_sf.description: Alpha for the team's defense value week over week EWMA

team_def_reversion.description: Reversion of the team's defense value to the league average

init_value.description: Initial value the league's QB value average
